concept.title: Enabling Subscriptions for Deferred Revenue
concept.abstract: If the revenue for a membership is deferred, then the merchant must set up the related subscription plans so that the term of the subscription is aligned to offset the journal entries. Calendar Subscription Plans can only defer revenue annually.

ol.li: Navigate to the eStore app and click the Subscription Plans tab. Click New.
Select Termed in the Type picklist.
Check the Is Active checkbox.
Check the Is Direct Debit Enabled checkbox.
Select Required in the Auto Renewed picklist
Enter 1 for the Initial Term Months.
Enter 1 for the Renewal Term Months.
Select Monthly in the Schedule Frequency picklist.
Click Save.
Navigate to the eStore app and click the Subscription Plans tab. Click New.
Select Termed in the Type picklist.
Check the Is Active checkbox.
Check the Is Direct Debit Enabled checkbox.
Select Required in the Auto Renewed picklist.
Enter 3 for the Initial Term Months.
Enter 3 for the Renewal Term Months.
Select Quarterly in the Schedule Frequency picklist.
Click Save.
Navigate to the eStore app and click the Subscription Plans tab. Click New.
Select Termed in the Type picklist.
Check the Is Active checkbox.
Check the Is Direct Debit Enabled checkbox.
Select Required in the Auto Renewed picklist.
Enter 12 for the Initial Term Months.
Enter 12 for the Renewal Term Months.
Select Annually in the Schedule Frequency picklist.
Click Save.
